scripts.source: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_FORMAT=es node_modules/.bin/rollup -c ./rollup.config.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/rollup -c ./rollup.config.js
scripts.min: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_MINIFY=true NODE_FORMAT=es node_modules/.bin/rollup -c ./rollup.config.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_MINIFY=true node_modules/.bin/rollup -c ./rollup.config.js
scripts.build: npm run source && npm run min
